Package dao

Interface DBAppointment

All Known Implementing Classes:
DBAppointmentImpl
public interface DBAppointment
This class provides the dbappointment methods to the customer appointment application.

    • addApp

      int addApp(int customerId, int contactId, int userId, String appTitle, String appDescription, String appLocation, String appType, LocalDateTime appStart, LocalDateTime appEnd)
      This is the add method that accesses the database and adds the appointment.
      Parameters:
      customerId - adds associated customer ID.
      contactId - adds associated contact ID.
      userId - adds associated user ID.
      appTitle - adds appointment title.
      appDescription - adds appointment description.
      appLocation - adds appointment location.
      appType - adds appointment type.
      appStart - adds appointment start date and time.
      appEnd - adds appointment end date and time.

    • modApp

      int modApp(int appId, int customerId, int userId, int contactId, String appTitle, String appDescription, String appLocation, String appType, LocalDateTime appStart, LocalDateTime appEnd)
      This is the modify method that accesses the database and modifies the selected the appointment.
      Parameters:
      appId - the selected appointment unique appointment ID.
      customerId - the selected appointment customer ID.
      contactId - the selected appointment contact ID.
      userId - the selected appointment user ID.
      appTitle - the selected appointment title.
      appDescription - the selected appointment description.
      appLocation - the selected appointment location.
      appType - the selected appointment type.
      appStart - the selected appointment start date and time.
      appEnd - the selected appointment end date and time.

    • deleteApp

      int deleteApp(int appId, int customerId, String appType)
      This is the delete method that accesses the database and removes the appointment.
      Parameters:
      appId - the selected appointment unique appointment ID.
      customerId - the selected appointment customer ID.
      appType - the selected appointment type.

    • upcomingAppAlert

      void upcomingAppAlert(LocalDateTime loginTimeAlert)
      This is the upcoming appointment alert method that accesses the database. Provides an alert for any upcoming appointment that is scheduled in 15 minutes of logging in. If there are no upcoming appointments an alert will state so.
      Parameters:
      loginTimeAlert - gets the local time date to check for upcoming appointments.

    • checkAppStart

      boolean checkAppStart(LocalDateTime appStart)
      This is the check appointment start time method. Checks the start time and see if it was within the business hours of 8:00 to 22:00 EST. This also converts the local time to EST time and it is within business hours.
      Parameters:
      appStart - gets the local date and time then checks start date and time.

    • checkAppEnd

      boolean checkAppEnd(LocalDateTime appEnd)
      This is the check appointment end time method. Checks the end time and see if it was within the business hours of 8:00 to 22:00 EST. This also converts the local time to EST time and it is within business hours.
      Parameters:
      appEnd - gets the local date and time then checks start date and time.

    • checkNewAppOverlap

      boolean checkNewAppOverlap(int customerId, LocalDate overlapStartDate, LocalDate overlapEndDate, LocalTime overlapStartTime, LocalTime overlapEndTime)
      This is the appointment overlap check method that accesses the database and checks if there are any overlapping appointments.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the appointment customer ID.
      overlapStartDate - the appointment start date.
      overlapEndDate - the appointment end date.
      overlapStartTime - the appointment start time.
      overlapEndTime - the appointment end time.

    • checkModifyAppOverlap

      boolean checkModifyAppOverlap(int customerId, LocalDate overlapStartDate, LocalDate overlapEndDate, LocalTime overlapStartTime, LocalTime overlapEndTime, int appId)
      This is the modified appointment overlap check method that accesses the database and checks if there are any overlapping appointments.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the selected appointment customer ID.
      overlapStartDate - the selected appointment start date.
      overlapEndDate - the selected appointment end date.
      overlapStartTime - the selected appointment start time.
      overlapEndTime - the selected appointment end time.
